snippet: Omar Calhoun, who had 17 points, led six Connecticut players in double figures as the 19th-ranked Huskies routed visiting Detroit, 101-55, in the opening round of the 2K Sports Classic.
abstract: Connecticut defeats Detroit, 101-55, in college basketball action.
lead_paragraph: Omar Calhoun, who had 17 points, led six Connecticut players in double figures as the 19th-ranked Huskies routed visiting Detroit, 101-55, in the opening round of the 2K Sports Classic.
